meanings.definition: An optical instrument with a lens for each eye, used for viewing distant objects.
meanings.sent1: I used binoculars to see the birds in the sky.
meanings.sent2: She always carries her binoculars when birdwatching.
meanings.sent3: The detective mistakenly used binoculars to read a menu at the restaurant.
meanings.sent4: His eyes were like binoculars, scanning the horizon for any signs of danger.
meanings.sent5: The binoculars revealed a breathtaking view of the mountains.
